mapper.select: SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct GROUP BY A.iproduct

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_user_child UC ON A.recommand_age = UC.ichild_age WHERE A.recommand_age = #{recommandAge} GROUP BY A.iproduct

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.rep_pic, A.price, B.product_cnt, A.price * B.product_cnt AS totalPrice, SUM(B.product_cnt * A.price) AS paymentAmount FROM t_product A JOIN t_basket B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct JOIN t_user C ON C.iuser = B.iuser WHERE B.iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_basket SET product_cnt = #{productCnt}, price = (SELECT price FROM t_product WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}) * #{productCnt} WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND iproduct = #{iproduct}
mapper.select: SELECT product_nm, iproduct, rep_pic, price, product_details FROM t_product WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}
SELECT COUNT(ireview) AS reviewCnt , AVG(product_score) AS avgProductScore FROM t_review WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order SET iuser = (SELECT iuser FROM t_user WHERE iuser = #{iuser}) ,iaddress = (SELECT iaddress FROM t_address WHERE iaddress = #{iaddress}) ,ipayment_option = (SELECT ipayment_option FROM t_payment_option WHERE ipayment_option = #{ipaymentOption}) ,address_nm = #{addressNm} ,phone_number = #{phoneNumber} ,email = #{email} ,process_state = 1 ,total_price = (SELECT sum(B.product_cnt * A.price) FROM t_product A JOIN t_basket B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct ) ,delivery_request = #{deliveryRequest}

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(idetails), 0) + 1 FROM t_order_details
INSERT INTO t_order_details (iorder, idetails, iproduct, product_cnt, product_price, product_total_price, refund_fl) VALUES
( #{iorder}, #{idetails}, (SELECT iproduct FROM t_basket WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}), (SELECT product_cnt FROM t_basket WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}), (SELECT price FROM t_basket WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}), (SELECT sum(A.price * B.product_cnt) FROM t_product A JOIN t_basket B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct WHERE iuser = #{iuser}), 0 )
